title: help
body: how can i fix my directX error i dont know how to fix it pls help riot

replies.body: This could be caused by a few factors like outdated drivers or security settings preventing certain files from being accessed.  Run through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure League is added as an exception.  Should the issue persists, our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide can help make sure your settings and drivers are in good shape.
